title: Looking for A Bigger Place…Try Our Renovated 1x1!
posting_body: Welcome to 1190 Mission Street at Trinity Place located within the most popular and urban neighborhood in San Francisco, just south of Market Street, also known as SOMA.
Our apartment homes are perfect for anyone looking for easy access to downtown, museums, and the popular Union Square.
Virtual and In-Person tours available!
This one bedroom/one bathroom apartment home has windows on two sides of the living room walls, bright white walls and cabinetry, and cherry faux wood flooring.
All this along with the beautiful and clean gym and secluded courtyard add to our modern and inviting environment.
Call to meet our amazing leasing team and come tour our gorgeous community today.
Virtual Tour: <URL>
For your convenience, we are open 7 days a week for tour appointments.
Virtual tours also available on our website; <URL>.
Features:
- Largest SF Whole Foods in our community!
-Amazon Locker Package Room
-Muni and BART station on the same block
-Walk Score of 95, Biker's Score of 97, Transit Score of 100
-Walk-in closets
-Granite countertops
-Spectacular city views
-Direct access from the building into the secluded Piazza courtyard
-24-hour front desk associates
-State-of-the-Art Fitness center
-Laundry on every floor
-Parking spaces available for rent in an enclosed garage
-Direct access from the building into the garage
-Pets allowed subject to company guidelines
-No smoking

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
